EmailTemplate.description: Notification when enquiry is done about case
EmailTemplate.name: Case Closed For Non-Members -JP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: 【Thank you very much】from DAZN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you very much for your inquiry.
Thank you for your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber}
We hope your question was satisfactorily answered by our Customer Support team, and you're now using DAZN without any issues. We have now closed your inquiry ID:{!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you are still having problems, please visit our help pages for useful information or contact us again.
Thank you and regards,
Privacy Policy https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/privacy
Terms of Use https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
